info.author: Brecht Baeten
info.description:
heron-automation
------------


Installation
============

Prequisites
^^^^^^^^^^^
*

Setup
^^^^^
* download the latest `release </releases>`_
* unzip and cd to the folder
* run ``python setup.py install``

Examples
========
To get started, check the `examples </tree/master/examples/>`_ folder
